messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] A local unschooler
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/12/04 12:02:49 AM, ctbucknum@shaw.ca writes:  She has something called A Book of
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/12/04 12:02:49 AM, ctbucknum@... writes:

<< http://www.smokylake.com/Christy/homeschool.htm >>

She has something called "A Book of Words"

http://www.smokylake.com/Christy/writing/bookofwords.htm

It's amazingly original and wonderful.

She has a page of advice to parents starting to homeschool, too.

http://www.smokylake.com/Christy/homeschool/parents.htm

Not all of her links are on every page, so if you go there, follow a couple
of trails if you have time.


Sandra

messages.subject: A local unschooler
messages.msgSnippet: I did a google on unschooling and this girls picture popped up in the list with Smokey Lake under it so I thought I d take a look.  Yup she s from Smokey Lake,
messages.messageBody:
I did a google on unschooling and this girls picture popped up in the list with Smokey Lake under it so I thought I'd take a look. Yup she's from Smokey Lake, Alberta, Canada not too far from me. Thought some may be interested in what one unschooling teen is up to. Teresa in Canada http://www.smokylake.com/Christy/homeschool.htm


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
